titleStmt.title: Institutions in the lawes of Englande cum priuilegio.

notesStmt.note: Cambridge University Library also has a fragment (Sayle 244) in the same types as and corresponding to leaves G2,3,6 and 7 in this edition but in a different setting with "villayne" while this edition has "vyllayne" on leaf G2r line 1--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
